column4: ok, so here's my problem: I'm on Ubuntu 10.10. I want to upgrade to 11.04, but it's no in the Update menu and 'sudo apt-get dist-upgrade' only wants to upgrade flash-installler and chrome. I have the 11.04 iso, but no disks. How do I upgrade?
is there a way to use the iso i have to upgrade without burning it to a cd?
